verses.verse: The <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G5613>As<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G32>messenger<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G2680>prepare<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G4675>you.<s%>

The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G4160><s%> 'Make ready the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G4160>Make<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight!<s%>'"

<S%G2491><s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all those of <S%G2415>Jerusalem<s%> went <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G907>were<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%> <S%G4215>river,<s%> <S%G1843>confessing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> clothed <S%G1746>with<s%> <S%G2574>camel<s%>'s <S%G2359>hair<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> a <S%G1193>leather<s%> <S%G2223>belt<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3751>waist.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2068>ate<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G3192>honey.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2784>preached,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3694>"After<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> he who is mightier <S%G2478>than<s%> <S%G3450>I,<s%> the <S%G2438>thong<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>sandals<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> <S%G3089>to<s%> stoop <S%G2955>down<s%> and <S%G3089>loosen.<s%>

<S%G1473%G99999>I<s%> <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1473>in<s%> <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> will <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> It <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G907>baptized<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>Immediately<s%> coming <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G5204>water,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G4977>parting,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove.<s%>

<S%G2532>A<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am well <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2117>Immediately<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1544>drove<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G4567>Satan.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the wild <S%G2342>animals;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G1247>serving<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was taken into <S%G3860>custody,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand!<s%> <S%G3340>Repent,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> in the Good <S%G1722>News.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G4043>Passing<s%> along <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> of Simon <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishermen.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1205>"Come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1205>you<s%> <S%G1096>into<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> for <S%G444>men.<s%>"
<S%G2112>Immediately<s%> they <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G4260>Going<s%> on a little <S%G3641>further<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G846>who<s%> <S%G846>were<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> the <S%G1350>nets.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>Immediately<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the hired <S%G3411>servants,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G1531>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> and <S%G1321>taught.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2258>he<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G2258><s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Immediately there <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he cried <S%G349>out,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1436>"Ha!<s%> What do we <S%G5101>have<s%> to <S%G2254>do<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> you <S%G3479>Nazarene?<s%> Have you <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2248>us?<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> you <S%G1488>are:<s%> the Holy <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Be <S%G5392>quiet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G4682>The<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G4682>convulsing<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>crying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> came <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G2284>were<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2284>amazed,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> they <S%G4802>questioned<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G846>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5124>this?<s%> <S%G5101>A<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>teaching?<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> he <S%G2004>commands<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G189>report<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G1519>everywhere<s%> into <S%G3650>all<s%> the region of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> and its surrounding <S%G4066>area.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>Immediately,<s%> when they had come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%>'s <S%G3994>wife<s%>'s mother <S%G2621>lay<s%> sick with a <S%G4445>fever,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> they <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>took<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G1453>up.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112><s%> The <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> At <S%G3798>evening,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G1096>had<s%> <S%G1416>set,<s%> they <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were possessed by <S%G1139>demons.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3650>All<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> gathered <S%G1996>together<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> who <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick<s%> with <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3554>diseases,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>demons.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G863>allow<s%> the <S%G1140>demons<s%> to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Early in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> <S%G3029>while<s%> it was still <S%G1773>dark,<s%> he rose <S%G450>up<s%> and went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>deserted<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G2546>there.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> followed <S%G2614>after<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%>
<S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3956>"Everyone<s%> is looking <S%G2212>for<s%> <S%G3754>you.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G71>"Let<s%>'s go elsewhere <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2192>next<s%> <S%G2969>towns,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G2784>preach<s%> there <S%G2546>also,<s%> because I came <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> this <S%G5124>reason.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2258>He<s%> went <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> casting <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>demons.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> A <S%G3015>leper<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3870>begging<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> kneeling <S%G1120>down<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G1410>to,<s%> you can make <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G3754>clean.<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Being moved with <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> he stretched <S%G1614>out<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "I <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G2511>to.<s%> Be made clean."

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2112>this,<s%> immediately the <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he was made <S%G2511>clean.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> He strictly <S%G1690>warned<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1690>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1544>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1544>out,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3708>"See<s%> you <S%G2036>say<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> to <S%G3367>anybody,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2512>cleansing<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> he went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> it <S%G4183>much,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to spread <S%G1310>about<s%> the <S%G3056>matter,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G846>Jesus<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G5320>openly<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>places:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> him from <S%G846>everywhere.<s%>
